scripts.release:orm: node scripts/bump-orm-version.cjs && bun run build:packages && cd packages/orm && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release:kit: node scripts/bump-kit-version.cjs && bun run build:packages && cd packages/kit && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release:all: node scripts/bump-changed-versions.cjs && bun run build:packages && node scripts/publish-changed.cjs
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:orm && npm run publish:kit
